ViewObject.Name: InternalDisOrgVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select T.organization_id, T.name as DISTRIBUTIONDEP_NAME from CUX_BONUS_DEPT_V T where T.organization_id<>-2 and exists(select 1 from CUX_BONUS_PERSON_DISTRIBUTION CBP where cbp.organization_id=T.organization_id AND CBP.Attribute4 = 'INTERNAL') and ( exists(SELECT 1 FROM apps.PER_ORG_STRUCTURE_ELEMENTS_V A1 WHERE A1.ORG_STRUCTURE_VERSION_ID = 42062 AND A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_CHILD = T.ORGANIZATION_ID AND exists(SELECT 1 FROM FND_PROFILE_OPTION_VALUES FPOV, FND_PROFILE_OPTIONS_VL FPO, FND_RESPONSIBILITY_VL FR, PER_SECURITY_PROFILES_V PSP WHERE FPOV.PROFILE_OPTION_ID = FPO.PROFILE_OPTION_ID AND FPO.USER_PROFILE_OPTION_NAME LIKE '%HR：安全配置文件%' AND FPOV.LEVEL_ID = 10003 AND FR.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME = fnd_global.RESP_NAME AND FPOV.LEVEL_VALUE = FR.RESPONSIBILITY_ID AND to_char(PSP.SECURITY_PROFILE_ID) = FPOV.PROFILE_OPTION_VALUE AND A1.ORGANIZATION_ID_PARENT = PSP.ORGANIZATION_ID ) ) or (T.organization_id = -1 and fnd_global.RESP_NAME = '赛迪上海_人力资源_薪酬（奖金）') ) order by nlssort(T.name,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
